title: Kansas City Moves Onto World Series
teaser: The Kansas City Royals advance to the World Series for the first time since 1985 after a dramatic sweep of the Baltimore Orioles.
contentencoded:
With a dramatic four game sweep of the Baltimore Orioles, the Kansas City Royals have won the ALCS, and advance to the World Series for the first time since 1985.

Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca joins Robin Young to talk about Kansas City’s win and the Giants, who could move on tonight.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
